events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position with a strong background in full-stack development and cloud technologies.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under Engineering due to keywords such as software, developer, and cloud computing appearing in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidate and coordinate further recruitment steps.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, showing the candidateâ€™s strong understanding of software engineering principles and problem-solving skills.
The candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically to proceed with technical interviews and expressed strong interest in the developer role.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the engineering team for the upcoming Thursday afternoon slot.
